keyMoments.title: Rayleigh Completes Coating of Thousand Sunny
keyMoments.description: Rayleigh meets the Straw Hats on the Thousand Sunny at Grove 17, having completed the ship coating necessary for diving to Fish-Man Island. He instructs Nami on how to operate the coated ship.
keyMoments.significance: The ship is now ready for the journey to Fish-Man Island, marking the completion of preparations for entering the New World.

statusHistory.modification: Ship coating completed for underwater travel

features.description: Special coating applied by Rayleigh that allows the ship to travel underwater to Fish-Man Island
